title: Arte Vegetal
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Western, Fast food, Take-out, Chilean
description: A take-out place with a counter to stand at to eat your lunch. Offers a variety of ready-to-eat empanadas with at least 3 different vegan options. Also vegan soy burger and veg hot dog, sub sandwiches with vegan ham, and vegan desserts. You can buy vegan frozen products (burgers, hot dogs, salami, nuggets, etc.)to take home as well as soymilk, TVP (carne de soya), and a few other grocery supplies.
